data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: When it comes to the huge success that others celebrated for me, the answer is that I once ran a full marathon. I wasn’t a person who is keen on sports. However, I started to be interested in running when I was in high school. After I passed our physical test at university, I decided to do something more. And that was when I came up with an idea that I want to run a full marathon. The process was not easy. I spent a whole semester training myself. I ran every morning at 5:30 on the playground. And I increased my time running every week to improve my endurance. What’s more, sometimes I would try to break my own record to make myself run faster. Unfortunately, I got injured and I had to take a break. But I didn’t give up, after my recovery, I kept running and kept training myself. Eventually, during the summer vacation of my sophomore year at university, I finally achieved my goal of running a full marathon. Many classmates of mine were clapping and thrilling out at the destination for me.(187 words)
data.referenceText: Describe a time someone congratulated you.
data.referenceTranslate: 描述一个某人祝贺你的时刻。
